resources.string: Bus Tracking System is an Application developed by BTS team as graduation Project that aims to track school buses by children parents to keep an eye on the bus location whenever is moving plus they get a notification when the bus is closed to their place Also, they could view details about the bus driver such as his image, name, age, nationality and the bus like, its number, model, capacity to ease their mind and worry less about their children during their ride between home and school. \n We didn\'t forget about the bus drivers who face problem to contact with kids parent and find where exactly the new children place the application make it easier to contact with the parent when there a need to Also, speed the process of locating the kids\' places whenever they need.
